vulnerabilities: Information Exposure Through an Error Message
Use of GET Request Method With Sensitive Query Strings
description: The function is vulnerable to information exposure through error messages (CWE-209) as it logs error messages that contain sensitive information. It also exposes sensitive information (CWE-200) by sending sensitive data in GET request query strings. Additionally, it does not properly validate or sanitize the user input (CWE-598), which can lead to other vulnerabilities such as Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) or SQL Injection.
